triples.name: Ising model
triples.relevance: The foundational statistical mechanics model that the paper generalizes with nonreciprocal interactions

triples.name: Phase transition
triples.relevance: The core theoretical framework used to study the nonreciprocal Ising model's behavior across different phases

triples.name: Mean-field theory
triples.relevance: Analytical approach used to derive mean-field equations predicting three stable homogeneous phases

triples.name: Critical exponent
triples.relevance: Used to characterize phase transitions and show how nonreciprocity changes exponents from Ising to XY universality class

triples.name: Active matter
triples.relevance: Application domain where nonreciprocal interactions and globally ordered oscillations are routinely observed

triples.name: Topological defect
triples.relevance: Framework for understanding spiral defects and droplet structures that emerge in the nonreciprocal system

triples.name: Ferromagnetism
triples.relevance: Physical phenomenon underlying magnetic ordering that the nonreciprocal Ising model extends

triples.name: Nonreciprocal Ising model
triples.relevance: Novel generalization of the Ising model with nonreciprocal interactions to study phase transitions and oscillatory behavior

triples.name: Droplet-capture mechanism
triples.relevance: Newly discovered stabilizing mechanism that prevents static order from being destroyed by droplet fluctuations when spin symmetry is broken

triples.name: Spiral defect
triples.relevance: New type of defect discovered in two-dimensional nonreciprocal systems whose proliferation destroys the swap phase
